spell.death_knights.death_strike.name: Death Strike
spell.death_knights.obliterate.name: Obliterate
spell.death_knights.obliterate.descripti: Strikes a powerful attack against the target, dealing {damage}_0 physical damage and {damage}_1 frost damage.
spell.death_knights.remorseless_winter.d: Surround yourself with a remorseless winter, dealing {damage} as frost damage to all enemies within 8 blocks every second.
spell.death_knights.agonizing_breath.des: Breathe a cone of frost, dealing {damage} as frost damage to all enemies in front of you. If no targets are hit, the breath will stop.
